Peliculas.Title: Pokemon 4Ever: Celebi - Voice of the Forest
Peliculas.Writer: Hideki Sonoda, Satoshi Tajiri, Jun'ichi Masuda
Peliculas.Actors: Veronica Taylor, Rica Matsumoto, Rachael Lillis
Peliculas.Plot: Ash must stop a hunter who forces the mythical Pokémon Celebi to help him destroy a forest.

Peliculas.Title: Resacón en China
Peliculas.Plot: One company offers a full-paid travel to Shenzhen to a Youtuber to show it's commercial ideas. He offers his best friend to go along and the trip goes insane.
